member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO
member.summary: Contains information about processor C-state policy settings. This structure is part of the structure.

member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO.TimeCheck
member.summary: The time that must expire before promotion or demotion is considered, in microseconds.

member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO.DemoteLimit
member.summary: The minimum amount of time that must be spent in the idle loop to avoid demotion, in microseconds.

member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO.PromoteLimit
member.summary: The time that must be exceeded to cause promotion to a deeper idle state, in microseconds.

member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO.DemotePercent
member.summary: The value that scales the threshold at which the power policy manager decreases the performance of the processor, expressed as a percentage.

member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO.PromotePercent
member.summary: The value that scales the threshold at which the power policy manager increases the performance of the processor, expressed as a percentage.

member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO.AllowDemotion
member.summary: When set, allows the kernel power policy manager to demote from the current state.

member.name: PROCESSOR_POWER_POLICY_INFO.AllowPromotion
member.summary: When set, allows the kernel power policy manager to promote from the current state.
